verses.verse: <S%H1945>Ho<s%>, every one that <S%H6771>thirsts<s%>, <S%H3212>come<s%> you to the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and he that has no <S%H3701>money<s%>; <S%H3212>come<s%> <S%H7666>you<s%>, buy, and <S%H398>eat<s%>; <S%H3212>Yes<s%>, come, <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> without <S%H3701>money<s%> and without <S%H4242>price<s%>.

Therefore do you <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for that which is not <S%H3899>bread<s%>? and your <S%H3018>labor<s%> for that which <S%H7654>satisfies<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%>? <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto <S%H398>me<s%>, and eat you that which is <S%H2896>good<s%>, and let your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6026>delight<s%> itself in <S%H1880>fatness<s%>.

<S%H5186>Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%>, and <S%H3212>come<s%> unto <S%H8085>me<s%>: hear, and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H539>you<s%>, even the sure <S%H2617>mercies<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
<S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I have given him for a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%>, a <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> to the <S%H3816>people<s%>.

<S%H7121>Behold<s%>, you shall call a <S%H1471>nation<s%> that you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1471>not<s%>, and nations that <S%H3045>knew<s%> not you shall <S%H7323>run<s%> unto you because of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for he has glorified <S%H6286>you<s%>.
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> while he may be <S%H4672>found<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> you upon him while he is <S%H7138>near<s%>:

Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>: and let him <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon <S%H430>him<s%>; and to our God, for he will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%>.
For my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are not your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>, neither are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

For as the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than the <S%H776>earth<s%>, so are my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H1361>higher<s%> than your <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and my <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> than your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>.

For as the <S%H1653>rain<s%> comes <S%H3381>down<s%>, and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7725>returns<s%> not <S%H7301>there<s%>, but waters the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and makes it bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> and <S%H6779>bud<s%>, that it may <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower<s%>, and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H398>eater<s%>:

So shall my <S%H1697>word<s%> be that goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: it shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> unto me <S%H7387>void<s%>, but it shall <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> that which I <S%H2654>please<s%>, and it shall <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in the thing whereto I sent <S%H7971>it<s%>.

For you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H8057>joy<s%>, and be led <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace<s%>: the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall break <S%H6476>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H7440>singing<s%>, and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%>.

Instead of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the fir <S%H1265>tree<s%>, and instead of the <S%H5636>brier<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> the myrtle <S%H1918>tree<s%>: and it shall be to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for a <S%H8034>name<s%>, for a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> that shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
